languages.text: "Пожалуй, в ваших словах есть доля истины. Пускай все остается как прежде".

traits.locale_text: "Пожалуй, в ваших словах есть доля истины. Пускай все остается как прежде".

languages.text: "Your words carry the ring of truth. Everything can remain as it was before."
languages.original_text: "Пожалуй, в ваших словах есть доля истины. Пускай все остается как прежде".

traits.locale_text: "Your words carry the ring of truth. Everything can remain as it was before."
"Your words carry the ring of truth. Everything can remain as it was before."
"Your words carry the ring of truth. Everything can remain as it was before."
"Your words carry the ring of truth. Everything can remain as it was before."

languages.text: “你的话有道理，就让一切维持原本的样子吧。”
languages.original_text: "Your words carry the ring of truth. Everything can remain as it was before."

traits.locale_text: “你的话有道理，就让一切维持原本的样子吧。”

languages.text: «Sus palabras son sinceras. Todo puede volver a ser como era antes».
languages.original_text: "Your words carry the ring of truth. Everything can remain as it was before."

traits.locale_text: «Sus palabras son sinceras. Todo puede volver a ser como era antes».

languages.text: 「お前の言葉は真実味がある。すべてこれまでどおりで構わない」
languages.original_text: "Your words carry the ring of truth. Everything can remain as it was before."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の言葉は真実味がある。すべてこれまでどおりで構わない」

languages.text: "Eure Worte klingen wahr. Alles kann so bleiben wie zuvor."
languages.original_text: "Your words carry the ring of truth. Everything can remain as it was before."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Worte klingen wahr. Alles kann so bleiben wie zuvor."

languages.text: « Vos paroles sonnent juste. Il n'est pas nécessaire de changer quoi que ce soit. »
languages.original_text: "Your words carry the ring of truth. Everything can remain as it was before."

traits.locale_text: « Vos paroles sonnent juste. Il n'est pas nécessaire de changer quoi que ce soit. »

languages.text: "Dediklerinde haklılık payı var. Her şey eskisi gibi kalabilir."
languages.original_text: "Your words carry the ring of truth. Everything can remain as it was before."

traits.locale_text: "Dediklerinde haklılık payı var. Her şey eskisi gibi kalabilir."
